import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Jumbotron, ListGroup, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import TDirectLogo from '../images/treasury-direct.png'; import '../index.css' class HomePage extends Component { state = {} render() { return (

Quickly and easily price your savings bonds!

Value, aggregate, and export any set of I, E, EE Series bonds or Savings Notes.

Choose an option:

Price bonds individually Price bonds from spreadsheet
HOW WE DO IT

The provides historical value files for I, E/EE Series bonds and savings notes. These files contain redemption price information for all issued bonds in any year and can be valued between May 1992 and present day.

For example, if desired, the redemption value of an EE Series bond issued in 1980 can be evaluated not only in May 2020 but also how much it was worth in May 1992.

WHAT YOU'LL NEED

) } } export default HomePage;
